summary: The auth package implements the authentication and authorization layer for the Flet SDK. It provides data models for OAuth tokens, users, and groups, and includes utilities to acquire, convert, refresh, and parse tokens. It also abstracts communication with OAuth providers to fetch authenticated user details and group memberships, offering both synchronous and asynchronous APIs.
business_intent: Enable developers to securely integrate OAuth-based authentication into Flet applications, manage user sessions, retrieve user and group information, and automatically handle token lifecycle operations.
